records.location_details: Near Sicily, Italy, in the sea, at coordinates 37.9833333333, 12.3333333333.

records.context_note: On 21.08.2021, 5 migrants were found. They declared to be 19 migrants in total. A dead body was found in water, and an Italian helicopter/Coast Guard is searching for other migrants in water.
records.evidence_quote: A dead body was found in water and an ITA/HELO/CG - Text removed - Technical Equipment Text removed - Technical Equipment are searching for other migrants in water.
